price: Mu bihe nk’ibyo, ubutabazi nyabwo buba ari ubwa Allah, Imana y’ukuri. Ni We uhebuje mu gutanga ingororano, ndetse ni na We uhebuje mu gutanga iherezo ryiza.
arabic: هُنَالِكَ ٱلۡوَلَٰيَةُ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ هُوَ خَيۡرٞ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٌ عُقۡبٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: hunālika al-walāyatu lillahi al-ḥaqi huwa khayrun thawāban wakhayrun ʿuq'ban
